top.title: Eurostar delays persist as passengers stuck onboard overnight
top.summary: Eurostar says it plans to run all of its services on Wednesday but there may still be delays and cancellations.

top.title: The 'thorny' issues that threaten to derail a Russia-Ukraine peace deal
top.summary: Two of the main sticking points involve territory and the fate of Europe's biggest nuclear plant, which is currently occupied by Russia.

top.title: Israel to bar 37 aid groups from Gaza
top.summary: The move was criticised by foreign ministers from from 10 countries including the UK, who said the new rules were "restrictive" and "unacceptable".

top.title: Meta buys Chinese-founded AI start-up Manus
top.summary: The tech giant wants to build into its own AI tools which do complex things with minimal interaction.

top.title: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids
top.summary: The draft regulations are aimed to address concerns around chatbots, which have surged in popularity in recent months.

top.title: James Bond game 007 First Light delayed to May 2026
top.summary: Dexter Original Sin actor Patrick Gibson will star as the British spy when the game releases on 27 May.

title.#text: Two cybersecurity employees plead guilty to carrying out ransomware attacks
The OneXSugar Wallet is the first gaming handheld with a folding screen
GameSir put a tiny force feedback steering wheel on its new Swift Drive controller
